channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Despite weather concerns, New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras Day and bids farewell to Carnival season
Rep. Sylvester Turner dies at 70, weeks after taking office
item.description: The cause of death is unclear. Turner took office weeks ago, filling the seat left vacant by the death of Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee.

item.title: Nick Offerman uses woodworking as tool to help at-risk young adults
item.description: Actor Nick Offerman teamed up with Los Angeles-based nonprofit Would Works to help underserved young adults develop valuable skills and find a safe sp...

item.title: Rep. Al Green may face censure after he was removed from House for disrupting Trump's Congressional address
Powerful US storm threatens to create a blizzard, tornadoes and fires
item.description: Powerful storms have killed two people in Mississippi, torn the roofs off an apartment building and a nursing home in Oklahoma and threatened communit...

item.title: Trump, Musk raise questions, without evidence, about whether gold at Fort Knox stolen
item.description: Trump suggested he and Elon Musk would go there to check it out firsthand.

item.title: Supreme Court rules Trump administration must unfreeze foreign aid payments
item.description: A divided Supreme Court ruled that the Trump administration must pay out nearly $2 billion in foreign assistance funds to nonprofit aid groups.

item.title: Jack Daniel's maker Brown-Forman keeps annual forecasts intact despite tariff risks
Trump doubles down on tariffs in address to Congress; Administration may change GDP calculation
item.description: President Trump reinforced his decision to impose tariffs against Mexico, Canada and China during his address to Congress Tuesday night. CBS News busi...

item.title: Mayors from 'sanctuary cities' testify before Congress
item.description: The Mayors of Boston, Chicago, Denver and New York City are testifying in front of the House Oversight Committee during a blockbuster hearing on sanct...

item.title: Senate panel questions Trump nominee to lead National Institutes of Health
'A hot mess': Federal office that resolves surprise medical bills slashed by Trump
item.description: Ending surprise medical bills used to be a Trump priority, but he just slashed the federal office working on that.

item.title: MAGA loses its mind over MSNBC host Nicolle Wallace’s ‘sickening’ comments about Trump honoring young cancer survivor
Man posing as NBA player rep swallows $769,000 in stolen Tiffany jewelry
item.description: The Texas man allegedly asked jail staff if he would be "charged with what's in my stomach."

item.title: Mexican artist unfurls giant portrait of Pope outside hospital where he is receiving treatment
Multiple heli-skiers caught in avalanche near Girdwood with immediate recovery not possible, troopers say
Trump 2nd term live updates: Ukraine officials say US has paused intelligence sharing
item.description: Ukrainian officials have confirmed the U.S. has partially suspended intelligence support to the country.

item.title: First-time driver's guide to car insurance: What to expect
item.description: Understanding car insurance basics is a vital first step for every new driver. Here's everything to consider now.
